A hefty cache of alleged benchmarks for the rumoured Nvidia GeForce RTX 3080 Ti 20GB were released. The numbers from Chinese language ‘tuber Immense Hardware Participant and spotted by Twitter client HXL assert the mooted card between the present RTX 3080 and 3090 boards, however nearer to the differ-topping megabucks RTX 3090.

The alleged leak involves GPU-Z grabs showing the cardboard with 20GB of memory working over the same 320-bit bus as an RTX 3080 however the same 10,496 Cuda core, 112 ROP and 328 texture unit counts because the RTX 3090. Core and boost clocks are again the same because the 3090, even supposing the RTX 3080 Ti’s memory clock is the marginally slower 1,188MHz of the RTX 3080 somewhat than the 3090’s 1,219MHz.

3080TI/3080 20GB? Testedhttps://t.co/dxJabdAPEJ pic.DownloadProxy/utNlPAVHRBJanuary 29, 2021

The provision suggests the board may per chance well properly be branded either RTX 3080 Ti or RTX 3080 Tremendous. However the benchmarks encompass RTX 3080 and RTX 3090 boards as reference points, all working at 4K. Provided that the specs of the rumoured card match the RTX 3090 bar a dinky bit much less memory bandwidth (and a tumble from 24GB to 20GB of VRAM), it’s no surprise to search out the RTX 3080 Ti is handiest ample at the support of the 3090.

Earlier rumours advised the 3080 Ti would commence in February for round $999. However that thought has since been discarded in favour of the board being delayed ‘indefinitely’, presumably ensuing from acute provide shortages afflicting the RTX 30-sequence.

An RTX 3080 spinoff with extra memory absolutely makes a quantity of sense, what with AMD’s Radeon RX 6000 sequence all offering 16GB of VRAM to the RTX 3080’s 10GB and the the RTX 3070’s 8GB, now to now not notify Nvidia’s dangle RTX 3060 launching earlier this month with fully 12GB.

It absolutely feels worship Nvidia’s RTX 30 Sequence differ may per chance well well be better balanced if the head SKUs had been revised with extra VRAM. On the other hand, with supplies of existing RTX 30 Sequence GPUs of all flavours final incredibly tight, the prospect of a new chipset turning into readily on hand any time soon appears to be like pleasing unbelievable.

What with provide shortages and insatiable set a query to for cryptocurrency mining, the provision of GPUs for, , true gaming doesn’t undercover agent promising for the foreseeable future.
